org.opensky.libadsb.msgs

Class TCASResolutionAdvisoryMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensky.libadsb.msgs.ModeSReply
      • org.opensky.libadsb.msgs.ExtendedSquitter
        • org.opensky.libadsb.msgs.TCASResolutionAdvisoryMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TCASResolutionAdvisoryMsg
extends ExtendedSquitter
implements java.io.Serializable
    Decoder for 1090ES TCAS Resolution Advisory Messages.
    Note: This format only exists in ADS-B versions >= 2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getSubtype

        public byte getSubtype()
        Returns:
        the subtype code of the aircraft status report (should always be 2)

      • getActiveRA

        public short getActiveRA()
        Returns:
        14 bits which indicate the characteristics of the resolution advisory (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.1)

      • getRACRecord

        public byte getRACRecord()
        Returns:
        4 bits which indicate all currently active RACs (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.2)

      • hasRATerminated

        public boolean hasRATerminated()
        Returns:
        whether RA previously generated by ACAS has ceased being generated (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.3)

      • hasMultiThreatEncounter

        public boolean hasMultiThreatEncounter()
        Returns:
        whether two or more simultaneous threats are currently being processed (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.4)

      • getThreatType

        public byte getThreatType()
        Returns:
        the threat type indicator: 0) no identity data in TID 1) TID contains Mode S transponder address 2) TID contains altitude, range, bearing 3) not assigned (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.5)

      • getThreatIdentity

        public int getThreatIdentity()
        Returns:
        the threat's identity. Check getThreatType() before. (Annex 10 V4, 4.3.8.4.2.2.1.6)

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
